## Templates

```{r template}
# Make dataframe with installed packages
pkgs <- installed.packages() %>%
  as.data.frame()

# Show row for posterdown package 
pkgs %>% 
  select(Package, LibPath, Version, Depends, Imports) %>%
  dplyr::filter(Package == "posterdown")
```
